item.title: The MyNumber service from Hashtag assists businesses in reducing their hotline expenses in the Philippines
item.description:
PLDT, through its corporate business group PLDT ALPHA Enterprise, has launched the PLDT #MyNumber service. This service streamlines a business’s hotline system into a memorable four to eight-digit contact number that starts with the “#” symbol (for example, #8888). This single number can be reached by consumers nationwide using PLDT landlines, Smart, Talk Nâ€™ Text, and Sun mobile phones. This service is designed for businesses that currently advertise different hotline numbers for different regions...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-mynumber-service-from-hashtag-assists-businesses-in-reducing-their-hotline-expenses-in-the-philippines/
